title: Travis Scott would ‘feel betrayed’ if Kylie Jenner hooked up with Drake
text:
Travis Scott would be less than impressed if Kylie Jenner started dating his pal Drake (Picture: FilmMagic)

Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott only split a few weeks ago but that hasn’t stopped the rumour mill from linking the beauty mogul with another rapper.

Following her attendance at Drake’s 33rd birthday bash this week, the internet thinks something could be going on between the pair after sources claim Kylie was at the Canadian hitmaker’s side throughout the night.

After additional comments from another source claims the duo ‘had an attraction’, Hollywood Life reports that Travis is less than impressed by the whispers he’s been hearing.

‘He would feel a bit betrayed if Drake started anything with Kylie that was anything romantic,’ the insider explained. ‘Travis considers Drake a good friend.

‘He trusts that it was just a fun night out and nothing more happened and people are just overshooting their expectations on this potential relationship.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

The source continued: ‘ Travis would still love to figure out getting back with Kylie, so hearing that a friend might be coming on his turf so to speak is a little jarring for Travis to handle.’

Sources claim Drake and Kylie were hanging out together a lot at his 33rd birthday bash (Picture: Rex Features)

Meanwhile, sources close to the ex-couple told TMZ that, despite their break-up, Travis has been spending a lot of time at Kylie’s house to rest after dislocating his knee falling on stage at Rolling Loud festival.

When he’s not there, he’s apparently spending a lot of time at the home and Kylie used to share in Beverly Hills and it’s expected to continue.

Sources even say the couple might be planning to spend Christmas as a family.

Watch this space!

description: Kylie Jenner's ex Travis Scott would 'feel betrayed' if she hooked up with Drake as dating rumours swirl following the rapper's birthday
